mapper.insert: insert into tbl_station (id, name, line_name, lat, lng) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{lineName}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: select id, name, line_name , lat, lng, odr from tbl_station where line_name= #{lineName} AND odr is not null order by odr
